emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient is 'fresh pasta'. Among the options, 'fresh pasta, fettucine spinach' is the most specific and closest match, as it explicitly mentions 'fresh pasta'. Although 'pasta, raw' is also a type of pasta, 'fresh pasta, fettucine spinach' is a more precise match for 'fresh pasta'. 'Stuffed fresh pasta' is too specific and processed. 'Pastasauce' is a final meal and not a raw ingredient.

The ingredient is 'garlic'. Among the options, 'garlic, raw' is the most direct and least processed match for 'garlic'. 'Garlic in oil' is more processed, and 'garlic baguette, frozen' is a final meal. 'Red onion' is a different ingredient.

The ingredient is 'onion'. Among the options, 'onion, raw' is the most direct and least processed match for 'onion'. 'Red onion' and 'onions, spring, raw' are specific types of onions, and 'onions, chopped and deepfried' is a processed product.

The ingredient is 'Green Asparagus'. Among the options, 'asparagus, green, raw' is the most direct and least processed match. 'Asparagus slices' is a processed form. 'Peas, green, frozen' and 'beans, green, raw' are different ingredients.
The ingredient is 'Squash'. Among the options, 'squash, raw' is the most direct and least processed match. The other options are different ingredients or processed forms.

The ingredient is 'basil'. Among the options, 'basil, fresh' is the most direct and least processed match for 'fresh basil'. 'Basil, dried' is a processed form. 'Pesto' is a final product, and 'parsley, raw' is a different herb.

The ingredient is 'cream'. Among the options, 'cream, whipping, 38 % fat' and 'cream, cultured, 18 % fat' are both types of cream. 'Cream, whipping, 38 % fat' has a higher emission factor, so it is chosen as per rule 5. 'Ice cream, dairy (cream based)' and 'cream pastry, layer cake' are final products.

The ingredient is 'grated parmesan'. Among the options, 'cheese, hard, parmesan, 32 % fidm.' is the most direct and specific match for parmesan cheese. 'Vegan cheese, grated or sliced' is a different type of cheese, and 'tortilla chips, cheese' is a final product.

The ingredient is 'mozzarella'. Among the options, 'cheese, semihard, mozzarella, 30 % fidm.' is the most direct and specific match for mozzarella cheese. 'Mozarella sticks' is a processed product, and 'goat cheese' is a different type of cheese.

The ingredient is 'Oil'. Among the options, 'olive oil', 'oil for frying', 'sunflower oil', and 'oil, rape seed (no eruca acid)' are all types of oil. 'Olive oil' has the highest emission factor, so it is chosen as per rule 5.
